item.text: If I speak in the tongues of men and of angels, but I do not have love, I am a noisy gong or a clanging cymbal.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1437">if</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4394" class="">prophecy</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3466" class="">mysteries</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1437">if</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="5620">so that</st> I can <st data-num="3179" class="">remove</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountains</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>, I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st>.
If I give away everything I own, and if I give over my body in order to boast, but do not have love, I receive no benefit.
Love is patient, love is kind, it is not envious. Love does not brag, it is not puffed up.

It is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="807" class="">rude</st>, it is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2212 1438">self-serving</st>, it is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3947">easily angered</st> or <st data-num="3049 2556">resentful</st>.

It is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">glad</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">about</st> <st data-num="93" class="">injustice</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4796" class="">rejoices</st> in the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.
It bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things.
Love never ends. But if there are prophecies, they will be set aside; if there are tongues, they will cease; if there is knowledge, it will be set aside.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3313" class="">part</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesy</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3313" class="">part</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> what is <st data-num="5046" class="">perfect</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st>, the <st data-num="1537 3313">partial</st> will be <st data-num="2673">set aside</st>.

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="3516" class="">child</st>, I <st data-num="2980" class="">talked</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3516" class="">child</st>, I <st data-num="5426" class="">thought</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3516" class="">child</st>, I <st data-num="3049" class="">reasoned</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3516" class="">child</st>. But <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> I <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> an <st data-num="435" class="">adult</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="2673">set aside</st> <st data-num="3516" class="">childish</st> ways.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="737" class="">now</st> we <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="2072" class="">mirror</st> <st data-num="135">indirectly</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> we will <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4383" class="">face</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4383" class="">face</st>. <st data-num="737" class="">Now</st> I <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3313" class="">part</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> I will <st data-num="1921" class="">know fully</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> I have been <st data-num="1921">fully known</st>.
And now these three remain: faith, hope, and love. But the greatest of these is love.
